long_desc.thetext:
The second output tab, "Log", should be filled with a sequential and growing list of log entries from the current test session (e.g. tests started, how they completed, stack traces, 'this.debug'-style output messages from individual tests, reloading of the test suite (Iframe), etc.). In contrast to the "Test/Tabled Result" tabs, which reflect only the currently running set of tests, the Log is written incrementally over the whole test session (i.e. until the user reloads QxRunner), encompassing any number of test runs the user might have started.
The toolbar with the "Clear" button should be positioned at the bottom of the tab.
A "Save As" button should be added to the toolbar. This button, when invoked, could e.g. open a separate browser window with the Log tab contents, so the user could use the browser's Save As facility to save the test session log to a file.
the test runner was redesigned for 0.8. The bug is no longer valid
